    Interactive Plot Class

    InteractivePlot.Rd

    Extensions for interactive plot features

    Super classes

    AdvancedGgplot::AGPlot -> AdvancedGgplot::Plot -> InteractivePlot

    Methods

    Public methods

    • InteractivePlot$add_tooltip()

    • InteractivePlot$add_click_handler()

    Method add_tooltip()

    Enable tooltips for a layer

    Usage

    InteractivePlot$add_tooltip(layer_id, tooltip_func)

    Arguments

    layer_id

    Layer identifier

    tooltip_func

    Function to generate tooltip text

    Method add_click_handler()

    Add click handler for a layer

    Usage

    InteractivePlot$add_click_handler(layer_id, handler_func)

    Arguments

    layer_id

    Layer identifier

    handler_func

    Function to handle click events

    Method enable_zoom()

    Enable zoom functionality

    Usage

    InteractivePlot$enable_zoom(enable = TRUE)

    Arguments

    enable

    Whether to enable zoom

    Method enable_pan()

    Enable pan functionality

    Usage

    InteractivePlot$enable_pan(enable = TRUE)

    Arguments

    enable

    Whether to enable pan

    Method enable_brush()

    Enable brush selection

    Usage

    InteractivePlot$enable_brush(enable = TRUE)

    Arguments

    enable

    Whether to enable brush selection

    Method as_widget()

    Convert plot to HTML widget

    Usage

    InteractivePlot$as_widget(width = NULL, height = NULL)

    Arguments

    width

    Widget width

    height

    Widget height

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    InteractivePlot$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
